appendix.title: Appendix: Ati Settings
appendix.para: If you're using the fglrx driver, you may have to enable the XVideo extension with the aticonfig command (part of the xorg-driver-fglrx package).
Alternatively, you can manually add those lines in the Device section of the fglrx driver in the /etc/X11/xorg.conf file. After Driver "fglrx" , add:
Note: As now, it's unclear which ATI cards properly supports Xvideo. Feel free to share your experiences.
